data.name: Stock Market Price Prediction with ML
data.description: Implemented Machine Learning Architectures and created hybrid architectures with LSTM and GRU. Collaborated with advisor and teammate on research project presentation and paper. Achieved significant accuracy in predicting stock market trends using ML models.

data.name: Reinforcement Learning from Visual Inputs
data.description: Trained and experimented with RL agents in OpenAI Gym for Cartpole balancing. Optimized training data through Variational Auto-Encoder to maximize agent performance. Published research findings on visual input processing in RL environments.

data.name: GPU vs CPU Performance Analysis
data.description: Developed algorithms to report and compare CPU and GPUs performance metrics on matrix transposition. Interfaced with IU's BigRed 200 supercomputer to perform metric comparisons. Published comprehensive analysis of GPU vs CPU performance in scientific computing.
